thread.section_title: Yahoo! Finance: Property Management Industry News
thread.title: Agree Realty reports 2Q results

title: Agree Realty reports 2Q results
text:
Agree Realty reports 2Q results Agree Realty posts 2Q FFO of $11.1 million 2 hours ago Content preferences Done 
BLOOMFIELD HILLS, Mich. (AP) _ Agree Realty Corp. (ADC) on Monday reported a key measure of profitability in its second quarter. 
The real estate investment trust, based in Bloomfield Hills, Michigan, said it had funds from operations of $11.1 million, or 62 cents per share, in the period. 
Funds from operations is a closely watched measure in the REIT industry. It takes net income and adds back items such as depreciation and amortization. 
The company said it had net income of $10.3 million, or 58 cents per share. 
The real estate investment trust posted revenue of $17.2 million in the period. 
The company's shares have fallen slightly more than 2 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Monday, shares hit $30.36, an increase of 1.5 percent in the last 12 months.
